mainText: Thanks for tuning in. This message was recorded on Sunday, May 18. On Monday May nineteenth, Rock Hill South Carolina is having a No Norman No Kings rally between two and four p m at 5 1 6 Oakland Avenue. This is a York County South Carolina Indivisible event to show displeasure in front of the South Carolina District 5 Representative, Ralph Norman. Bring your American flags and patriotism. South Carolina Stands with Ukraine is holding a rally in greenville on Saturday May thirty first. They will be at the Main Street Court house at one p m. Their email contact is s c four ukraine at g mail dot com. That is the number four in s c four ukraine at g mail dot com. South Carolina's largest juneteenth festival is saturday june twenty first in Columbia. Tickets and information are online. go to juneteenth freedom fest dot com
